column5: I'm happy with a 28 pack of Bud. X-mas is for the kids and seeing family. My wife and I buy each other a few things we need and then we spoil the kids.  Happy ho ho to all btw.
Iam getting a Okums sheffield can't wait to get it and go try it out it will be my first center pin so can't wait.    jordan
I want my sock cooked!

For my 80 yr 7 month old Mother to see just a few more Christmas days. Just back from visiting her for a few days and unfortunately I have a feeling that it won't be long before she joins my father...that I also made my Christmas visit with at the cemetary, as I left Smiths Falls.
Luckily I have pretty much everything I need so I will go big and hope:  Dear Santa  Please let the Leafs win the cup this season  Love Steve

So how about it? What do you want for Christmas?  Myself, I really dont need or want for anything. I have everything I need under my roof.  There are a few things I would like to see happen... But perhaps that is best left for another time.   Gerritt.   Ok needed to edit this... Santa if you are a OFC'r and are reading this I would like a new shiny 24" iMac  Thanks in advance!

Santa if you are listening can you make sure the UPS man gets my New exhaust and air induction system by Christmas so I can make 42 more horses in my Titan. Plus sound really good when you give it the gas.  Ps I have been a very good boy  this month and I also paid for the present.    Art
I just want my girlfriend to come back safe & sound from BC and my grandmother to be alive for at least one more (battling cancer).
I would like to get 4 sheets of ply wood removed from my garage,   , JK  PM sent bud,  boston.

Good ole Santa .. she was good to me.  I wanted a Lowrance H2O GPS unit - got it. I wanted the Canadian Topo Mapcreate to make maps - got it. I wanted some new musky lures - got them. I wanted a rod rack to hold all my rods - got it.  Geee ... ya think I should stop there or keep on going.  I have a wonderful Santa Clause.
I need a fishfinder and a bow mount for the new boat, i have asked Santa for BPS gift cards.
Santa, I WANT IT ALL!!  But I'll be happy with family, friends fresh cinnamon buns and meat pie.  Pam
I want another hand knitted fishermans sweater made by the greatest M-I-L in the world!!!       BTW... it's a good thing that's what I want...'cause that's what I'm getting (I peeked   )
ice
ice yes ice hopefully on Nipissing by Jan 1st. Yes i know fat chance.
Fishergirl that is awesome!!! I just Got a new Nephew @ 3:00pm!!  Gerritt.

WOOHOO!!!! Congrats fishergirl!!!! What's her name?  As for me...I just want a safe and happy Christmas.  I dont really need anything...except seeing my kids' smiles on Christmas morning.  I'm not delusional in thinking those smiles will be there all day, but one can hope....haha
I am not asking for much   I would like to have a Lund Tyee 1950 with 225hp and a 9.9 kicker and a Ford F150 4X4 pick up to pull it.Some cold weather and very thick ice.

I want "all the above"... and more. I want house too and social life.  Santa if you give me all the above and the more part. I'll give you something really worth your while. All my credit card debts!!

Wow, congrats Gerritt!!! Could not ask for a better gift.   Merry Christmas!  Her name is Deanna.   I know what you mean about the smiling faces not being there all day long and like you said you can only hope.LOL.    What you hope for and what really happens it two totally different things!LOL
Honestly nothing Wake up in the morning breathing with my family
Safe ice on Nippissing for Jan 5  - dont think he can fit that in the bag though
Total peace of mind.....

Well i would have liked to have my kids at home with me this xmas. All four togeather under my roof.....But alas Not this xmas as my eldest two will be in EUROPE  Merry xmas everyone godbless & may you have a fantabulous 2007   and i hope i catch bigger fish than all of you next yr   lol
I don't make a big deal about presents, it's for the little ones now. I would be very satisfied with an ATV under the tree though.
all i want is 8 inches of ice and all the lakes near my house oh yeah and SNOW SNOW SNOW AND YES MORE SNOW!!!!!!
LOL, to feel normal again! Sick sucks! Still better me than my wife or kids!

In October i received a kidney transplant after being on dialysis for a year and a half, that and being with family is all i could wish for for Christmas, hope everyone has a wonderful holiday and all the best in 2007, Brian

I'm wishing for very little for myself... I wish my kids have a fantastic Xmas! this is the first year that they are really getting it, Santa/presents, that is. Just been too young until this year to really grasp what's going on. For myself, I only want one, ok, maybe two more days on Quinte before ice. I think I've bribed the "Warden" well enough with presents, so... we'll see if all the stars align and I can break free for a day or two. Oh yah, I want peace in the world yada, yada, yada! HH
